message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can take less, I'll take more, it's a good deal!
I'll take a slightly smaller share, but still a good deal for both of us!
I'm willing to compromise, but you'll have to take less
I'm willing to compromise further, let's meet in the middle!
You're getting close to the minimum, don't push it!
I'm willing to give you a slightly bigger share, but not that big!
You're running out of options, take it or leave it!
